description:
Kirara is Najica`s main assistant in the perfume side of operations for CRI. She is kept in the dark concerning all things relating to Najica`s spy work. Najica must often make excuses for Kirara when she goes on secret missions, due to the fact that she is not allowed to know the truth concerning Najica`s undercover activities.
Source: Official Site
name: Mitsuboshi Kirara
